basic_serializer_map.hpp

00001 #ifndef  BOOST_TYPEINFO_EXTENDED_MAP_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_TYPEINFO_EXTENDED_MAP_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // basic_serializer_map.hpp: extenstion of type_info required for serialization.
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 #include <set>
00020 
00021 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/utility.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/archive/detail/auto_link_archive.hpp>
00024 
00025 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00026 
00027 namespace boost { 
00028 namespace serialization {
00029     class extended_type_info;
00030 }
00031 
00032 namespace archive {
00033 namespace detail  {
00034 
00035 class BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) basic_serializer;
00036 
00037 bool operator<(const basic_serializer & lhs, const basic_serializer & rhs);
00038 
00039 struct BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) type_info_pointer_compare
00040 {
00041     bool operator()(
00042         const basic_serializer * lhs, const basic_serializer * rhs
00043     ) const {
00044         return *lhs < *rhs;
00045     }
00046 };
00047 
00048 typedef BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) std::set<
00049     const basic_serializer *, 
00050     type_info_pointer_compare
00051 > basic_serializer_map;
00052  
00053 } // namespace detail
00054 } // namespace archive
00055 } // namespace boost
00056 
00057 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00058 
00059 #endif // BOOST_TYPEINFO_EXTENDED_MAP_HPP
